name: Little Cabin on Deer Run
rentalCondition:
GENERAL PROPERTY CONDITIONS ---- There are differences in our Northern Properties and Southern Properties.  Dependent upon the property rented determines the Rental Conditions listed herein.  
AGE REQUIREMENT:  Guest is at least twenty-five (25) years of age.  Guest is responsible for all other guests and visitors of the rental property during the reservation.  
PAYMENT:  50% of the total reservation amount is due at time of booking.  30 Days prior to arrival, the balance is due.  Should final payment not be made 30 days prior to arrival, the reservation may be cancelled and money would not be refundable.  
TERM OF RENTAL AGREEMENT:  The Rental Agreement begins at 4:00 p.m. on Check-in Date and ends at 11:00 a.m. on Check out Date.  Early check-in’s or late check-outs are subject to approval.  
CANCELLATION POLICY:  Guests who cancel at least 30 days before check-in will get back 100% of the amount they've paid minus 5% credit card processing fees.   
SMOKING:  No smoking inside the property.  A minimum fee of $250 will be assessed if smoking in the property is detected.  
PARKING:  Is restricted to the properties designated spaces.  Do not park in neighboring properties. 
REFUNDS:  Guest hereby agrees and acknowledges that guest shall not be entitled to a refund in the event guest departs before the end of the reservation or guest arrives late.  Furthermore, any refund or compensation for the occurrence of any and all events out of the control of Owners, including but not limited to, Acts of God, weather conditions, power outages, water outages, mechanical failure of appliances and electronics, heat and air will be at the sole discretion of Owners.  Mountain roads can be curvy and steep.  Gravel drives and roads are well maintained; however, it is highly recommended to have four-wheel drive or chains on two-wheel-drive vehicles.  No refunds will be given due to road conditions.  
USE OF RENTAL PROPERTY:  Guest shall occupy and use the rental property in a manner that shall not disturb or offend neighbors of the rental property. 
SENSITIVE MOUNTAIN SEPTIC:  Toilets:  The following items are NOT to be flushed down the toilets.  Baby wipes, facial wipes, diapers, tampons or any feminine products, Q-Tips, excessive toilet paper.  Should a toilet overflow and the plumber determines the cause was by any of the above items, guest will be charged the entire service call plus time and effort by owners.  Use the trash cans located beside the toilets.  
BEFORE DEPARTING:  Please do the following before departing the property:  
•	Furniture - If you moved it, please put it back. 
•	Remote controls - make sure all remote controls are left visible in each room with a television, DVD player or other devices using a remote control.  
•	Netflix - if you signed into Netflix, remember to sign out.  
•	Dishes, pots, pans, etc., must be washed and put away for the next guest.  If the Property has a dishwasher, please load, and turn it on.  
•	Beds - If you slept in the bed, just leave it unmade.  DO NOT strip beds.
•	Towels - leave used towels in the bathtub, shower or on the floor.
•	Lights, fans, and appliances should be turned off. 
•	Garbage must be bagged and placed in the outside cans or containers or left inside the property.  
•	Fireplaces - extinguish all fires in fireplaces and make sure safety screens are closed or in place. 	
•	Thermostats - During cool season, set thermostat at 55 degrees upon departure


NORTHERN PROPERTIES located in Sundance, Utah - Carriage House Above the Stream, Hideaway Above the Stream, Treehouse on the Stream, Cottage on the Stream, Log Cabin on the Stream
MINIMUM STAY:  A two-night minimum stay is required.  Longer minimum stays may be required during holiday periods or special events.  
PETS:  Well behaved adult dogs are considered.  No cats.  $100.00 pet fee will be charged plus a pet deposit.  
PET EXCEPTION: Carriage House Above the Stream is NOT pet friendly.  No pets at this property.  
RESTRICTIONS NORTHERN PROPERTY:   The following activities are not permitted within the boundaries of the residential community or resort:  
•	ATVs or snowmobiles*
•	Discharge of firearms or use of archery tackle*
•	Hunting or trapping*
•	Outside fires, fireworks or any combustible substance are absolutely prohibited**
•	Excessive noise that disrupts, disturbs, annoys or offends neighbors*
•	Sound curfew is 9:00 pm*
•	Large recreational vehicles or large trailers (The roads are too narrow) *
•	Parking anywhere except designated cabin parking.  No street parking or parking in neighboring cabins*
*	Fines of up to $1,000.00 may be assessed for prohibited activities.  
**	Open fires are restricted outside and will be fined $2,500 by the County.

SOUTHERN PROPERTIES located in Beaver, Utah - Wooded Ridge 6, Wooded Ridge 8, Wooded Ridge 10, Snowflake 15, Snowflake 17
MINIMUM STAY:  A one-night minimum stay is required.  Longer minimum stays may be required during holiday periods or special events.  
PETS:  Well behaved adult dogs are considered.  No cats.  $100.00 pet fee will be charged plus a pet deposit.  
RESTRICTIONS SOUTHERN PROPERTY:   The following activities are not permitted within the boundaries of the community or resort:  
•	Discharge of firearms or use of archery tackle*
•	Hunting or trapping*
•	Outside fires, fireworks or any combustible substance is prohibited**
•	Excessive noise that disrupts, disturbs, annoys or offends neighbors*
•	Sound curfew is 9:00 pm*
•	Parking anywhere except designated parking.  
*	       Fines of up to $1,000.00 may be assessed for prohibited activities.  
**	Open fires are restricted outside and will be fined $2,500 by the County.

gallery.description: Main entrance.
This is your view as you walk in the front door.
Main level living room.
Looking from the windows back to the front door.
Main level kitchen.
Dining area and pool table.  And, by the winow is a sit down Ms. PacMan machine!
Dining room table seats eight plus bar seating for four.  BBQ is out on the deck.
Main level game room near kitchen.
Sitting area by pool table
Bedroom #2 - Main Level Master with adjoining bathroom.
Loft play area near entrance.
Loft Bedroom #6 - Upstairs - Climp the stairs  and find a great place to hide and sleep.
Master Bath - Main level - Extra Long Soaking Tub and adjoinging shower.
Main level master bath with laundry facilities access.
Main level master bathroom.  Extra long soaking tub.
Downstairs living room with kitchen.
Downstairs kitchen.
Lower level living room with kitchen
Downstairs living room, fireplace and TV.
Lower level main queen bedroom with hot tub access.
Bedroom #3 - Lower level Queen room - shared bath with outside access.
Bedroom #3 - Lower level queen, shared bath with outside access.
Lower level bedroom with queen bed.
Downsyairs laundry.
Ski In - Ski Out - Walk up the road 300 feet and drop down Mid-Mountain and then ski down with your ski pass and ride the lift up to the higher trails.
Back of house with propane fire pit - summer only

description.name: Little Cabin on Deer Run
description.summary:
Little Cabin on Deer Run is anything but little.  We've just always called it that.  Take this opportuity to come and visit. 
The updated and spacious design encourages gathering everyone together upstairs or downstairs while affording everyone their own personal, quiet retreats.

Main level kitchen is fully stocked and all you need for meal preparation is food.  Downstairs kitchen stocked and ready for cooking pizza or popcorn at night while watching movies.  

Gas fireplaces, flat screen TV’s,  comfortable seating creates a cozy, relaxed place to get in touch with your family and friends or simply re-center yourself.  

Four bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with a queen bed and two sleeping lofts with two twin beds afford lots of sleeping options.   Two separate laundry stations  with full size washer and dryers with laundry supplies are a plus.  

Hot Tub on the covered deck for relaxing soaks in the cold air is a treat by itself. 

Activities are abundant in the area and can fill up your days dependant on the time of year.  Winter beckons you to grab your skis, your ski pass and walk to the  end of the road and drop down mid-mountain to the slopes.   Ski down and then ride the lift back to the higher trails.  In the summer , walk the roadway loop for a magnificent view of Mt. Timpanogoas.   Go moountain biking, zip lining, hiking , horseback riding....... So much to do.  Or do nothing at all but enjoy the Little Cabin.  

CAR CHARGING STATIONS ARE AVAILABLE IN THE UPPER PARKING LOT OF SUDANCE.
NO EVENTS HOSTED AT THIS PROPERTY.  
NO PETS.
WINTERS (November through March) REQUIRE FOUR WHEEL OR ALL WHEEL DRIVE VEHICLES.
description.transit:
Car Rental is best.  
WINTER - From November 1st until March 31st, four wheel or all wheel drive is mandatory.
description.interaction: Pamela and Lynn live here on the mountain and are always available by phone or text for any questiions, recommndations and assistance you might need.
description.neighbourhood: Located in a gated community within a five minute drive to the  Sundance Resort.  There you will find award winning restaurants such as The Foundry Grill that serves breakfast, lunch and dinner; The  TreeRoom for that extra special dining experience; The Owl Bar with burgers and the best staff ever and music on the weekends. (Adults only); or stop at the Deli for sandwiches, soup, coffee, smoothies, cookies and goodies.  The Deli also has those necessities you may need like milk, eggs, bread and a great steak or two.  If you're skiing, (or not) try out the OutLook AspreSki Restaurant for lunch.
description.space: Entire cabin is yours to use.
description.houseManual:
GENERAL PROPERTY CONDITIONS 
AGE REQUIREMENT:  Guest is at least twenty-five (25) years of age.  Guest is responsible for all other guests and visitors of the rental property during the reservation.  
PAYMENT:  50% of the total reservation amount is due at time of booking.  30 Days prior to arrival, the balance is due.  Should final payment not be made 30 days prior to arrival, the reservation may be cancelled, and any payment made becomes non-refundable.  
LIMITED OCCUPANCY:  Maximum occupancy is limited to the number of individuals listed on the reservation.  If the host concludes that this policy has been breached, Host reserves the right to expel the entire party with no refund.  
TERM OF RENTAL AGREEMENT:  The Rental Agreement begins at 4:00 p.m. on Check-in Date and ends at 11:00 a.m. on Check out Date.  Early check-ins or late check-outs are subject to approval.  
CANCELLATION POLICY:  Guests who cancel at least 30 days before check-in will get back 100% of the amount, they've paid minus 5% credit card processing fees.   Should a reservation be rescheduled at the request of the guest or recommendation of the Host, and then cancelled, the payment made would not be refundable.  
SMOKING:  No smoking inside the property.  A minimum fee of $250 will be assessed if smoking in the property is detected.  
PARKING:  Is restricted to the properties designated spaces.  Do not park in neighboring properties or in the road. 
REFUNDS:  Guest hereby agrees and acknowledges that guest shall not be entitled to a refund in the event guest departs before the end of the reservation or guest arrives late.  Furthermore, any refund or compensation for the occurrence of any and all events out of the control of Owners, including but not limited to, Acts of God, weather conditions, power outages, water outages, mechanical failure of appliances and electronics, heat and air will be at the sole discretion of Owners.  Mountain roads can be curvy and steep.  Gravel drives and roads are well maintained; however, it is highly recommended to have four-wheel drive or chains on two-wheel-drive vehicles.  No refunds will be given due to road conditions. 
HOSTS RIGHTS:  Guest agrees that if the conditions and limitations set forth herein are not met, Host shall have the right to cancel this agreement and may enter the Property, either by statutory proceedings or by force, to inspect the Property and ensure that Guest has vacated the Property.  All monies paid by the Guest shall be forfeited as liquidated damages.  
INDEMNIITY CLAUSE:  Guest hereby agrees to indemnify and hold Host harmless from all claims, including those of third parties, arising out of or in any way related to Guest’s use of Property or the items of personal property provided therein.  Guest assumes all risk of injury or other losses relating to any recreational activities, including use of hot tub on the Property and will hold Host harmless with respect therein.  
REPAIRS AND MAINTENANCE:  This property is reserved wit the Host’s furniture and household furnishings.  Host shall not be responsible for providing additional furnishings or equipment not presently available in Property.  Guest will report any maintenance issues immediately to the Host.  Host will make every effort to repair and/or replace any equipment that is not working property but cannot guarantee that all equipment will be in good operating order at all times and no rate adjustments or refund will be made for equipment or appliance failures.  
USE OF RENTAL PROPERTY:  Guest shall occupy and use the rental property in a manner that shall not disturb or offend neighbors of the rental property. 
SENSITIVE MOUNTAIN SEPTIC:  Toilets:  The following items are NOT to be flushed down the toilets.  Baby wipes, facial wipes, diapers, tampons or any feminine products, Q-Tips, excessive toilet paper.  Should a toilet overflow and the plumber determines the cause was by any of the above items, guest will be charged the entire service call plus time and effort by owners.  Use the trash cans located beside the toilets.  
CARE OF PREMISES/DAMAGES:  NO PET PROPERTIES AN D NO SMOKING – Violation of these or anyf the House Rules constitutes grounds for automatic eviction plus forfeit of all payments and all booking/reservation costs if violated.   Guest agrees to pay Host for any damages to the property, grounds, furnishings, household items, hot tubs caused by Guest during its occupancy.  This will include payment of any additional cleaning charges incurred dur to Gits occupancy.   
PETS:  Depending on the property, well behaved adult dogs are considered.  No cats.  $100.00 non-refundable pet fee will be charged per stay.  Should your pet cause any damage or additional housekeeping is required for “accidents” in the house, additional costs will be incurred.    

PET EXCEPTIONS:  
1.	Northern Properties - NO PETS – Carriage House on the Stream, Cuckcoo’s Nest, Mid-Mountain Retreat, Little Cabin, Big Cabin
2.	Southern Properties - NO PETS – Wooded Ridge #9 and Wooded Ridge #13
BEFORE DEPARTING:  Please do the following before departing the property:  
1.	Furniture - If you moved it, please put it back. 
2.	Remote controls - make sure all remote controls are left visible in each room with a television, DVD player or other devices using a remote control.  
3.	Netflix and Streaming Services  - if you signed into your home accounts, remember to sign out.  
4.	Dishes, pots, pans, etc., must be washed and put away for the next guest.  If the Property has a dishwasher, please load, and turn it on.  
5.	Beds - If you slept in the bed, just leave it unmade.  DO NOT strip beds
6.	Towels - leave used towels in the bathtub, shower or on the floor.
7.	Lights, fans, and appliances should be turned off. 
8.	Garbage must be bagged and placed in the outside cans or containers or left inside the property.  
9.	Fireplaces - extinguish all fires in fireplaces and make sure safety screens are closed or in place. 	
10.	Thermostats - During cool season, set thermostat at 55 degrees upon departure

RESTRICTIONS:  The following activities are not permitted within the boundaries of the residential community or resort:  
1.	ATVs or snowmobiles* (Southern Properties excluded from this restriction)
2.	Discharge of firearms or use of archery tackle*
3.	Hunting or trapping*
4.	Outside fires, fireworks or any combustible substance are absolutely prohibited**
5.	Excessive noise that disrupts, disturbs, annoys, or offends neighbors*
6.	Sound curfew is 7:30 pm*
7.	Large recreational vehicles or large trailers 
a.	(Northern Properties – The roads are too narrow) 
8.	Parking anywhere except designated parking.  No street parking or parking in neighboring cabins or condos
9.	Open fires are strictly restricted outside – no firepits, bonfires or any such version of these and will be fined $2,500.00.

FINES OF UP TO $1,000.00 MAY BE ASSESSED FOR PROHIBITED ACTIVITES


Guest and Host, by signing this Rental Agreement acknowledges that they will comply with the terms of this Agreement and each assumes the responsibility for the obligations set forth herein.  Guest acknowledges receipt of the House Rules.  Guest acknowledges that they have read, accepts, and agrees to the terms set forth.
